content.body: Surma I plan to review the proposal this week; do you still plan to include module function shorthands? Or should I ignore that part?

content.body: I don't think I'll include it in the mvp

We had a pretty extensive discussion about module blocks in the "loader" chat

content.body: ultimately it underscored for me the conclusion that we probably want to say, if you postMessage a module block multiple times, you get a different identity/module map entry each time
